name: Razer Gigantus V2 XXL
description: Extra-large gaming mouse pad measuring 940x410mm. Features micro-textured cloth surface for precise tracking, anti-slip rubber base, and optimized surface tension for both speed and control.

reviews.review_text: Covers my entire desk! No more running out of space.
Great surface for both gaming and productivity.
Edges could be stitched better but overall solid.
